resources.string: Beautiful, green, interesting place, you can have a nice walk and rest here. You must visit this place
Beautiful! Full of easy to navigate trails - many surprises like mill ruins or old graves… And really big ! worth venturing in to !
A beautiful lake located on the outskirts of Szczecin. Perfect for strolling and picnics
Very nice spot with delicious food. Perfect for breakfast. Great variations of coffee, from all around the world. Worth trying!

A must go to place if you want the best possible view in Szczesin. It is a popular place and on some days, there is a line of people waiting to be seated. The prices are a little higher than on the ground, but they are still reasonable. The view is well worth it.
Very good drip coffee and cappuccino. everyone should also try the cakes offered on site. Very nice service.
tasty sushi, just as good hot dishes. ingredients fresh, and all in all we are able to recommend. Service pleasant
The food is mostly traditional Polish food, really good in taste - also really nice service. Not many (almost none) options for vegetarians and no option for vegan. Good choice list of wines.
Small and cozy, very nice and very tasty at the same time!
